content: Oct 26 Trucking firm Old Dominion Freight Line Inc said on Thursday its quarterly net income climbed  driven by a strengthening economy and higher prices it charges for the freight it carries because of tightening industry capacity.
name: Old Dominion Freight Line Inc
title: Economy  higher prices lift profit at trucking firm Old Dominion

content: * Old Dominion Freight Line announces third-quarter earnings per diluted share of $1.24  up 20.4% on revenue of $873.0 million
name: Old Dominion Freight Line Inc
title: BRIEF-Old Dominion Freight Line says Q3 earnings per share $1.24

content: * Old Dominion Freight Line provides update for third-quarter 2017
name: Old Dominion Freight Line Inc
title: BRIEF-Old Dominion Freight Line provides update for Q3 2017

content: Aug 31 Almost three days before Hurricane Harvey hit Texas  hardware retailer Home Depot Inc received an alert from a weather service and activated its disaster-response plan to get supplies to those in the storm's path  while turning a profit  too.
name: Old Dominion Freight Line Inc
title: UPDATE 1-As Harvey gained fury  Home Depot raced to respond
